questions.prompt: Solve the system of equations: <math xmlns='http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML'><mrow><mtable columnalign='right left'><mtr><mtd>2x + 3y = 8</mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd>x - y = -1</mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></math>
questions.explanation: Solving the equations simultaneously, we get x = 1 and y = 2.

questions.prompt: Find roots of equations: <math xmlns='http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML'><mrow><mtable columnalign='right left'><mtr><mtd>4n - 2m = 6</mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd>2n + m = 1</mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></math>
questions.explanation: Solving the equations simultaneously, we get n = 1 and m = -1.

questions.prompt: Find a and b of equations: <math xmlns='http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML'><mrow><mtable columnalign='right left'><mtr><mtd>3a + 4b = 5</mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd>5a - 2b = 3</mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></math>
questions.explanation: Solving the equations simultaneously, we get a = 11/13 and b = 8/13.
